Birthday Party
item.description:
This week marks Dr. Tsai’s birthday. Despite the fact that we are suffering from the pandemic, we are thrilled to be able to celebrate with our collaborator, Dr. Leu, and his lab members. May this day be filled with every unique enjoyment for you, and may the year offer all the wonderful things you are looking forward to.

Wishing you a beautiful day with good health and happiness forever. Happy Birthday!

Chinese New Year End Party
item.description:
We take a one-day trip to 象山, Taipei, and enjoy a pleasant lunch at Nola Kitchen. At the end of the Chinese New Year, we thank all of our laboratory members so much for being the kind of researchers you are.

We send our best wishes to all of the families for a safe, happy holiday season and a very happy new year.

Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction. We hope happiness and joy come to share great moments with the people you most appreciate.

item.title: Transgenic refractory Aedes aegypti lines are resistant to multiple serotypes of dengue virus.
BITS Christmas Party
item.description:
The season of festivities has come and we wish that all of us spend the best time with our family and friends.

With Christmas, the new year is also around the corner and our wish for the upcoming year is that we can continue to grow in the same way and at the same pace.

Merry Christmas & Happy New year!

Let’s start dreaming big and making our dreams come true this year!

TFAS
item.description: Alternative splicing (AS), the selective removal of exons and reconnection of exons by multiple processes, shapes how genetic information controls important cellular functions in different tissues of higher metazoans. In this project, we would like to investigate the association between AS and chromatin accessibility of promoter bound by different TFs genome-widely.

item.title: LncRNA
item.description: LncRNA, a transcript within 200 nucletides and without coding potential, could interact with either single-stranded or double-stranded DNA and further regulate gene expression. The overall goal of this project is to better understand the function of lncRNA acting on the transcriptional regulation and epigenetic regulation via lncRNA-DNA triplexes formation. Our primary goal is to elucidate the fundamental features of lncRNA-DNA interactions in the genomes and further develop prediction tools. Following the identification of lncRNA-DNA interaction loci, we are going to study the relationships between different lncRNAs and their associations with gene expression and chromatin status.

item.title: A Brand New BITS!!
item.description: Our old website, which built by wordpress, was gradually being difficult to maintain. Therefore, we shift to hugo, an open-source static site generator, to build up a new website recently. The website is still under construction and we’ll keep updating our current projects as soon as possible. We really need advices to make it perfect, any suggestions are welcome!

MetaABC
item.description: MetaABC is a pipeline that integrates advanced binning tools coupled with data filters and normalizations for improving metagenomic analysis. It incorporates two means for removing artifacts, five methods for taxonomic binning, an approach to re-analyze unassigned reads, and an option to control sampling biases via genome-length normalization. It can handle sequencing data generated using different technologies. In a single platform, MetaABC furnishes various analyzing routes that allow users to reach an optimized outcome.
